i.name: Damnation
i.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

q.name: Death Sentence
q.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

w.name: Dark Passage
w.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

e.name: Flay
e.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

r.name: The Box
r.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

i1.blurb: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
description: {{sbc|Basic Attacks:}} '''Thresh's''' [[basic attack]]s do not use projectiles and his basic attack wind-up is only reduced by {{fd|0.25}}% per {{sti|as|{{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} (compared to the standard 1% per 1%).

{{sbc|Innate:}} Enemies who die near '''Thresh''' drop ''souls'' for 8 seconds, which he can collect by either approaching them or by placing {{ais|Dark Passage|Thresh}} lantern near them. Each collected ''soul'' permanently grants '''Thresh''' {{sti|ap|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' ability power}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' armor}}}} and increases {{ais|Dark Passage|Thresh}} shield's strength and {{ais|Flay|Thresh}} minimum {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} by 1.

Champions and large enemies always drop 1 ''soul'', epic [[monster]]s always drop 2, but small [[minion]]s and monsters only have a 33% chance to drop 1. ''Souls'' are visible to allies and only become visible to enemies if their team has {{tip|sight}} of '''Thresh'''.
i1.name: Damnation
notes: * The probability for ''souls'' dropping from small minions and monster on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} starts at 33% but adjusts dynamically to match the expected quota (lowers if above, rises if below, remains if even). ''Souls'' collected are not considered when adjusting the probability.
* ''Thresh'' gains the ''Soul Gluttony'' buff and resets ''Damnation's'' counter every time he collects 255 souls.

** The maximum amount of ''souls'' '''Thresh''' can collect is 999,999, granting him {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' ability power}} and {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' armor}} ({{fd|99.99}}% damage reduction, reduced to {{fd|99.98}}% when hit by {{ii|Last Whisper}}).
* {{ci|Nunu|Nunu & Willump}} drop a soul each (sometimes the icy ghosts from {{iis|Twin Shadows}} active will drop one each after reaching their targets).
* At level 18:
** 66 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to reach {{cis|Gnar}} level 18 base armor ({{as|{{fd|65.6}}|armor}}).

** 70 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to deal more damage with a fully-charged {{ai|Flay|Thresh}}-enhanced basic attack than {{ci|Vayne}} with a fully-ranked {{ai|Final Hour|Vayne}}-enhanced basic attack ({{as|154 AD}} with no [[item]]s or [[rune]]s).
** 144 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to have more armor than {{ci|Malphite}} with a fully-ranked {{ai|Brutal Strikes|Malphite}} ({{as|{{fd|124.2}}|armor}} with no items or runes).
** 168 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to deal more damage with {{iis|Lich Bane}} {{nie|Spellblade}} than with {{iis|Trinity Force}}.
** 278 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to have more armor than {{ci|Rammus}} with a fully-ranked {{ai|Defensive Ball Curl|Rammus}} ({{as|224|armor}} with no items or runes).

riot.name: Damnation
riot.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

riot.name: Death Sentence
riot.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
riot.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.

q1.blurb: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
description: {{sbc|First Cast - Death Sentence:}} After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Thresh''' throws out his scythe in the target direction and forms a tether with the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Hitting an enemy reduces ''Death Sentence's'' {{stil|cooldown}} by 3 seconds.

While the tether persists, '''Thresh''' is {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} and periodically tugs at his scythe's chain, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} the target a short distance towards himself. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds, or instantly upon hitting a minion or monster, '''Thresh''' can cast {{ai|Death Leap|Thresh}} while the tether holds.
{{sbc|Second Cast - Death Leap:}} '''Thresh''' {{tip|dashes}} to the tethered enemy, removing the {{tip|stun}} but becoming able to attack again.
q1.name: Death Sentence
notes: * ''Thresh'' will [http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=33837947#post33837947 not face in the target direction] during ''Death Sentence's'' cast animation (only after the projectile starts traveling).

* ''Death Sentence's'' {{tip|stun}} duration is reduced by {{sti|[[Tenacity]]}} while the tether will persist for the full duration (unless broken by {{nie|Quicksilver}}, {{ii|Mikael's Crucible}}, {{si|Cleanse}}, or certain [[Champion ability|abilities]]).

** Targets affected by {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}} will not be {{tip|stun|stunned}} or {{tip|airborne|pulled}} at when hit (''Thresh'' will not tug at his target even if {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}} wears off before ''Death Sentence'' ends).
** ''Death Sentence's'' tether will not be broken by becoming [[Untargetability|untargetable]] ({{ai|Playful|Fizz}}, units grabbed by {{ai|Force of Will|Syndra}}).
** ''Death Sentence's'' effects will persist if ''Thresh'' dies before the duration ends.

riot.name: Dark Passage
riot.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
riot.tooltip:
Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him.

The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.

w1.blurb: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' throws his lantern to the target location, {{tip|sight|revealing}} its immediate surroundings and collecting nearby {{ai|Damnation|Thresh|souls}} for the duration. The lantern remains for 6 seconds and automatically returns to '''Thresh''' if he moves more than 1500 units away from it.
'''Thresh''' and the first ally to come near the lantern is {{tip|shield|shielded}} for 4 seconds.
An ally that grabs the lantern will {{tip|dash}} to '''Thresh's''' location and shield themselves for the same duration.
w1.name: Dark Passage
notes: * The lantern is considered terrain while active, slightly displacing enemies standing in the target area (is not considered a [[crowd control]] effect) but not interrupting [[channel]]s.
* Allies can pick up the lantern through small walls if its grab radius allows it.
* ''Thresh'' cannot grab the lantern but can shield himself if he walks near it.
* The lantern can be targeted by {{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}, and {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}.
* The lantern's duration and maximum leash range are each displayed as a circle on the ground.
* Allies carried by ''Dark Passage'' will dash to ''Thresh's'' current location (not where he was when the lantern was picked up).
* Contrary to popular belief, ally picking up the lantern will NOT be untargetable during the dash. They can be attacked, targeted and suffer crowd controls normally.

riot.name: Flay
riot.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal from {{ f3 }} to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) additional magic damage, which builds up while not attacking (total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% total Attack Damage).

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind Thresh. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} second.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

e1.blurb: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Thresh's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increasing with time spent not attacking enemy units or neutral monsters.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' sweeps his chain in a broad line towards the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit, {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them in the chain's direction, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them afterwards for 1 second.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|Collected {{ai|Damnation|Thresh|souls}} (+ up to {{as|{{ap|100 to 200}}% AD}})}}
e1.name: Flay
notes: *''Flay's'' passive's buff icon changes colors depending on charge level:
** {{ai|Flay 5||100%}} (''Thresh's'' scythe will glow green and a sound effect will play)
* {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} will apply ''Flay's'' passive to each enemy hit, with the secondary targets taking minimum damage (charge resets upon hitting the primary target).

* The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not affect structures or [[ward]]s (hitting them does not consume the bonus damage or reset the charge).
* ''Flay's'' passive can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} (the enhanced attack is not consumed and the charge is not reset).
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Flay's'' passive's interaction with {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parry}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|block}}, and {{tip|blind}} (regarding both bonus damage and charge reset).

riot.name: The Box
riot.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
riot.tooltip:
Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, the remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

r1.blurb: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.75}}-second delay, '''Thresh''' surrounds himself with 5 spectral walls, each lasting for up to 5 seconds. Walls break upon contact with an enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} by 99% for 2 seconds.
Enemy champions hitting any wall beyond the first take no damage and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for only 1 second.
r1.name: The Box
notes: * No additional details.
